itemdesc-ore-sapphire: It looks like it holds the sea, yet its riches prove all the different.
itemdesc-ore-citrine: It looks like it tastes of the finest fruits, yet its only flavor is that of its vissage.
itemdesc-ore-ruby: It looks like it was baked in blood, yet it shines with a noble gleam.
itemdesc-ore-amethyst: It looks as though a great empire could be built on its glow, yet are those who wear it truly noble?
itemdesc-ore-bauxpearl: Its like a great pearl of the ocean, yet who can tell what clam made it?
